tags.description: Moderate gradient cobble, rocks beach. Boulders. Long carry at low water. All-tide beach camping on pebble. Summer Springs to 5.0 m leave small beach area. Upland sites possible with brushing. Year-round creek, waterfall, pool. Attractive. View.
tags.name: Goletas Waterfall (BCMT)

tags.description: Sheltered, smooth pebble, shale beach. Back eddy near shore. Former log sort area re-vegetated so needs serious brushing if more than a handful of tents are used. Rustic camp furniture. Attractive. No water.
tags.name: Balaklava Island Booms (BCMT)

tags.description: Low gradient cobble beach. Spacious, sheltered, grassy area between trees, towards point. Afternoon sun. Rustic camp furniture. Seasonal water at creek, to ~june. Attractive, popular site. Short trail.
tags.name: Nolan Point (BCMT)
